We have private rooms and dormitories with curtains, power outlets on each bed and lockers. Our mattresses, pillows, blankets and sheets are excellent quality to ensure your rest. We are open 24 hours, our reception speaks English, we have every day activities for you all day and night, every day. Breakfast and towels are included. Hot water 24 hours and also Colombian coffee and free all day. We have tv room with fireplace, and a tandoori bbq. Open kitchen for guests use. Our internet is fiber optic and we offer free WIFI. Have a nice read in our garden hammocks

Botanico is located in the neighbourhood called, 'La Candelaria Centro', named a World Heritage Site by the United Nations. The best of our location is to be surrounded by excellent restaurants with Colombian, organic, vegetarian and international food, bars and universities. Many craft markets, and market places with fries and vegetables. 80% of the museums in Bogota are located in our neighbourhood. .

We have private rooms and dormitories with curtains, power outlets on each bed and lockers. Our mattresses, pillows, blankets and sheets are excellent quality to ensure your rest.We have three, 8-people dorms, and one of them is for women only. We have 3 more private rooms with a double bed and share bathroom. And we have 4 more Suites with a double bed and a single bed, private bathroom ( this room is for 1, 2 o 3 people)

description.description: Our beautiful colonial house is located in the most famous, turistic and historic neighbourhood of Bogota, La Candelaria. The house is recently remodelled and opened its doors to guests in July, 2017. Our house is uniquely known in Bogota for its large tropical garden and the amazing views over all of the city. The house is an architectural jewel.
